required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of Additional Laser Treatments.
clinical_study.official_title: The Efficacy and Safety of an Additional Vaginal Laser Treatment in Women Previously Treated With Laser for Gynecological Indications.

brief_summary.textblock: Women previously treated with vaginal CO2 laser will receive an additional treatment 6 months after cessation of previous laser treatment or a sham laser treatment. The efficacy and safety of the additional treatment will be assessed.

detailed_description.textblock: The following study is intended to evaluate the efficacy and safety of an additional laser treatment for women previously treated for gynecological indications with laser treatments. Women will be randomized to one of 2 groups: 1. Study group-additional single laser treatment. 2. Control group-single sham laser treatment. All women will fill out validated questionnaires regarding sexual function, urinary stress incontinence and satisfaction after treatment. All women will be followed for an additional 6 months to evaluate the length of effect.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From the treatment session up to 6 months post-treatment

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the treatment session up to 6 months post-treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in the female sexual function index questionnaire score (range 0-35)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the treatment session up to 6 months post-treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Improvement in the monthly rate of sexual intercourse

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the treatment session up to 6 months post-treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in the urinary distress index questionnaire score (range 0-15)

arm_group.description: Women receiving a single laser treatment.

intervention.description: A single session of CO2 vaginal laser treatment
A single session of sham laser treatment.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Previously treated with 3 laser treatments.
- Clear PAP test from the last 3 years.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Vaginal bleeding of unknown source.
- Vaginal surgery in the past 9 months.
